long_description: Durable and flexible, the Columbia Mega Trail pants for boys offer superior comfort and stretch to follow your boy's every move. Even if it's a challenge to keep up with him, they won't disappoint. Omni-Shield(TM) fabric repels water and is abrasion-resistant while remaining soft and flexible. Integrated Omni-Shade(TM) UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. A touch of stretch allows for freedom of movement and improved fit. Partial elastic at the waist offers a snug fit. Zippered side pocket on pant leg secures small valuables. Columbia Mega Trail pants dry quickly so they can be washed and worn again in a matter of hours.
